data.name: MonthlyYearlyInvalidDailyRetentionFormatTypeException
data.value: In Monthly and Yearly retention schedules, RetentionFormatType cannot be 'Daily' if Weekly BackupSchedule is selected

data.name: RetentionDurationCountInvalidException
data.value: RetentionDuration in Days/Weeks/Months/Years should be from 1 - 9999

data.name: WeeklyRetentionScheduleNullException
data.value: If Weekly backup schedule is enabled, Daily retention schedule should be null and Weekly retention schedule should not be null

data.name: WeeklyScheduleEnabledButScheduleIsNullException
data.value: RetentionPolicy: IsWeeklyScheduleEnabled=true but WeeklySchedule is NULL

data.name: YearlyScheduleEnabledButScheduleIsNullException
data.value: RetentionPolicy: IsYearlyScheduleEnabled=true but YearlySchedule is NULL

data.name: YearlyScheduleMonthsOfYearException
data.value: MonthsOfYear list in YearlyRetentionSchedule should not be NULL and not contain duplicate entires

data.name: InvalidDayInDaysOfMonthOfMonthlyYearlyRetentionPolicyException
data.value: In Monthly/Yearly retention schedule, Day in DaysOfMonth should be 1-28 (or) IsLast=true set for one day only

data.name: InvalidDaysOfMonthInMonthlyYearlyRetentionPolicyException
data.value: In Monthly/Yearly retention schedule, DaysOfMonth is NULL or empty or contains duplicate entires

data.name: InvalidDaysOfWeekInMonthlyYearlyRetentionPolicyException
data.value: In Monthly/Yearly retention schedule, DaysOfWeek is NULL or empty or contains duplicate entires

data.name: InvalidScheduleRunDaysInScheduleException
data.value: In Schedule, if ScheduleRunFrequency is Weekly then ScheduleRunDays should not be empty and not contain duplicate entries

data.name: InvalidScheduleTimeInScheduleException
data.value: ScheduleTimes in Schedule should be in UTC Timezone, have ONE time and must be of multiples of 30 Mins with seconds and milliseconds set to 0

data.name: InvalidWeeksOfMonthInMonthlyYearlyRetentionPolicyException
data.value: In Monthly/Yearly retention schedule, WeeksOfMonth is NULL or empty or contains duplicate entires

data.name: MonthlyYearlyRetentionDailySchedulePolicyNULLException

data.name: MonthlyYearlyRetentionWeeklySchedulePolicyNULLException
data.value: In Monthly/Yearly retention schedule, if RetentionScheduleFormatType=Weekly then RetentionScheduleWeekly should NOT be null
